subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: About 76,000 people attended the first game at Soccer City stadium, the site in Johannesburg that will host the opening game and final at the World Cup after being given a $300 million upgrade.
snippet: About 76,000 people attended the first game at Soccer City stadium, the site in Johannesburg that will host the opening game and final at the World Cup after being given a $300 million upgrade.
